Answer: Take propane tanks in rural America. Propane a staple for many people to live their regular lives. The problem with propane tanks is that they run out of propane and need to be refilled. This is fine when the customer is the one responsible for filling it, but when it is the companies responsiblitiy it becomes a big headache to go from house to house miles and miles away to check each tank. A few years ago, a company named Senet, introduced a sensor and communication technology for their propane tanks.
